title: Economics Amplified: Reflecting on Writing a Handbook of Macroeconomics
description:
John Taylor and Harald Uhlig recount a recent series of conference aimed at codifying the most important principles guiding modern macroeconomic analysis. 

Music is by Boris Mann 2, whom you can listen to on Soundcloud. Licensed under Creative Commons.
